A blackk pod is falling from the sky

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Windlord:

Windlords explained him what had happned and added "I'm afriad 
that... do you rememberm the pred's program that was slaving 
Nightlight? that one that woulnd't let us reprogram her? "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade was shocked by such a greeting.
> 
> AzureBlade: What? CR hurting me? What are you talking about? 
Wasn't 
> this my check up or something?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:::
> > 
> > "What happened, Azure???? why Cr's was hurting you? Denzabar 
told 
> us 
> > that you have some virus inside you that will be activvate when 
it 
> > is menazing to remove?? how did you get it?"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > About at that time, AzureBlade slowly rebooted. He could 
remember 
> > > nothing af what had happened, and he simply thought he had 
gone 
> > > through some repair.
> > > 
> > > AzureBlade: Hey guys! Thanks for waking me up!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > > > Denzabar, or rather, the elder, spoke, " The Virus only 
> > activates 
> > > when it is 
> > > > about to be removed, the harder we try to remove it, the 
harder 
> > it 
> > > hurts him. 
> > > > This virus was thought to be extinct after the third 
> Generation, 
> > > but, alas, 
> > > > they kept it."
